sub_title: Content Optimization Manager at Viking Europe

education.field_of_study: Language and Literature/Letters, Bilingual studies, French/English

profile_positions.description:
- managing a team of 9 professionals (8 content editors and 1 data steward applications); responsible for talent and performance reviews, retrospectives, roadmap set up and workload coordination 
- managing Master Data processes related to content optimization initiatives & coordinating the definition of work instructions based on existent and new rules
- initiating process reviews for content and looking after improvements on quality, efficiency, and speed to market
- supporting research on innovation and automation opportunities, and contributing to implementation of new tools within the content team
- preparing work packages and coordinating priorities for the content team, based on business requirements and company roadmap
- coordinating and integrating in the team's roadmap internal initiatives on different content related projects (campaigns, print catalogue, brand shop pages, content reviews on item/subclass/category level, etc.)
- supporting content reviews derived from customer feedback with the aim of enhancing the customer experience across our websites
- stakeholder management, by acting as main point of contact for content improvement on all product categories for Merchandising, Procurement, Webshop Operations, User Exprience, SEO team, SEA team, Print Catalogue, etc.
- project coordination for automatic description creation & implementation with NLG software

Systems and software tools such as: STEP, IOT, Cognos, Excel, Jira (Service Desk, Confluence, Software) Tableau, Qualtrics, Bazaarvoice, AX Semantics
profile_positions.title: Content Optimization Manager

profile_positions.description:
- responsible for data collection and item onboarding for the Food & catering and Cleaning & Hygiene assortment
- collecting relevant compliance documentation and data validation before product onboarding
- responsible for product content translation and/or revision for the French websites (Belgium Walloon and Switzerland)
- maintaining a direct communication with internal (Romania, UK, Netherlands) and external stakeholders
- end-to-end responsibilities for new products (from the creation phase to product content and online launch)

Systems and software tools such as: STEP, IOT, AS400, Cognos, Excel, Jira (Service Desk, Confluence, Software) Tableau, SDL Trados
profile_positions.title: Senior MDM Scrum Content Specialist with French

profile_positions.description:
- responsible for the end-to-end process coordination for our French stakeholder
- evaluating the workload and organizing the distribution of tasks within the team
- coordinating generic/master content development in French + linking to the corresponding Web hierarchies
- management tasks (reporting, performance reviews for team members)
- proposing improvement initiatives for the France related processes
- acting as subject matter expert towards all stakeholders in regards with the France procedures and tasks
- maintaining a good stakeholder collaboration and communication in order to achieve the company's goals
- managing the MDM Specialists within the team
- contributing to the team's continuous qualitative growth on professional and personal level
- offering training on both the systems and the procedures for all team members
- offering continuous support on systems, procedures, development
opportunities for all team members

Systems and software tools such as: STEP, IOT, AS400, Cognos, Excel, Jira (Service Desk, Confluence, Software)
profile_positions.title: MDM Project Leader France

profile_positions.description:
- responsible for data collection & data quality review for new item onboarding
- responsible for item maintenance in the designated PIM system 
- responsible for the creation and/or revision of the product content for the French channels
- keeping a direct communication with the colleagues from the offices in the Netherlands, the UK and France regarding the process and procedures
- end-to-end responsibilities for new products (from the onboarding phase to the online launch and post-launching content reviews)

Systems and software tools such as: STEP, IOT, AS400, Cognos, Excel, Jira Service Desk
profile_positions.title: MDM Scrum Content Specialist with French

profile_positions.description:
- working in the after-sales department for the French language customers (France, Belgium and Switzerland)
- providing first line support for remote customers in French and English
- offering pre-sales information regrading the company's product assortment (from descriptive to technical information) as well as on the ordering process online
- maintaining a direct communication with the customers for different situations and/or complaints
- escalating complaints to the responsible departments
- managing customer communication via the following virtual mediums : phone, email, chat
profile_positions.title: Customer Care Representative
